function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"In-person interviews conducted at construction sites may expose researchers and interviewees to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases among researchers and interviewees.","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety protocols and social distancing measures during in-person interviews. Require the use of personal protective equipment (PPE).","Technologies":"Use of video conferencing technology for virtual interviews.","People":"Researchers, interviewees, construction workers, and stakeholders.","Owner":"Researchers, construction project managers"},{"Description":"Limited understanding of the impacts of COVID-19 on the construction sector due to the novel and unexpected nature of the pandemic.","Impact":"Inadequate preparedness for addressing the impacts of COVID-19 on construction stakeholders.","Mitigation":"Conduct qualitative content analysis and correspondence analysis to explore the impacts of COVID-19. Share findings to increase awareness and preparedness.","Technologies":"Qualitative analysis tools, correspondence analysis tools.","People":"Research team, construction stakeholders, policymakers.","Owner":"Research team, policymakers"},{"Description":"Lack of availability for in-person interviews may affect the depth and quality of information gathered from interviewees.","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of the impacts of COVID-19 on construction projects and stakeholders.","Mitigation":"Use a combination of in-person and online interviews to capture diverse perspectives. Follow-up with additional online surveys or virtual discussions.","Technologies":"Online video conferencing platforms, survey tools for virtual discussions.","People":"Interviewees, researchers, construction stakeholders.","Owner":"Researchers, construction project managers"}]}
